descriptions.description: This record contains a curated version of a public basketball statistics dataset spanning 1947 to the present, including BAA, NBA, and ABA seasons. The dataset includes multiple CSV tables covering player statistics, team statistics, advanced metrics, award shares, draft history, and seasonal summaries. The curated repository enhances the original dataset by improving file organization, documentation, metadata structure, and preservation readiness. It is intended for educational and research reuse in sports analytics, historical trend analysis, and reproducible data workflows.

Curation activities included organizing files into a consistent naming convention, documenting file-level contents, preparing a structured DataCite XML metadata record, and improving repository-level documentation through a README file and supporting materials. No alterations were made to the raw statistical values; only organizational and descriptive enhancements were implemented.
Original source dataset available via Kaggle: NBA-ABA-BAA Stats (1947-Present). This curated version preserves provenance while improving discoverability and documentation.
